mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, description, writer, file_url) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{fileUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT idx, title, writer, created, last_updated AS lastUpdated, file_url AS fileUrl FROM board
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR description LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
ORDER BY idx DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR description LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
